caption:
Wrapping up this Random Acts of Giving campaign with a heartwarming giveaway! 🎁❤️ After asking hundreds of nurses how they would treat themselves this holiday season, we were deeply moved by their selfless spirit as many said they’d rather pay it forward.

From buying groceries for those in need to treating co-workers to coffee, these acts of kindness humbled us. This giveaway, we’re thrilled to gift THREE $150 Amex gift cards to those of you who want to pay it forward. Your kindness makes this season so much brighter. 🌟

How to enter: 
1️⃣ Follow @connectRNapp. 
2️⃣ Like this post.
3️⃣ Comment and tell us how you would pay it forward with an act of kindness. 

Winners will be announced on Saturday, December 23rd in our stories.

Winners must be located in the United States and must be 18 years or older at the time of entry. This contest is not affiliated with Instagram or Facebook. By participating or entering, you agree to release Instagram of all liability.

#RandomActsOfGiving #SpreadTheJoy #SeasonOfGiving #Gratitude #ClinicianAppreciation #RNs #LPNs
